awscc_qbusiness_retriever (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::QBusiness::Retriever

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • application_id (String)
  • configuration (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • created_at (String)
  • display_name (String)
  • retriever_arn (String)
  • retriever_id (String)
  • role_arn (String)
  • status (String)
  • tags (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • type (String)
  • updated_at (String)

Nested Schema for configuration

Read-Only:

  • kendra_index_configuration (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • native_index_configuration (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for configuration.kendra_index_configuration

Read-Only:

  • index_id (String)

Nested Schema for configuration.native_index_configuration

Read-Only:

  • index_id (String)

Nested Schema for tags

Read-Only:

  • key (String)
  • value (String)
